resources.string: Pause the activity by pressing the Home button
Restart the application from the launcher
Rotate the device to destroy and create the activity again
The activity has been created … onCreate()
The activity has been launched … onStart()
The activity is now in the foreground and running … onResume()
Another activity is in front of this activity … onPause()
The activity is no longer visible on the screen … onStop()
The activity is restarting after being stopped … onRestart()
The activity is being destroyed … onDestroy()
